actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Silvio O. Conte Fish and Wildlife Refuge Act to provide that the Secretary of the Interior may acquire lands for purposes of that Act only by donation or exchange, or otherwise with the consent of the owner of the lands, and for other purposes.
short_title: Silvio O. Conte National Fish and Wildlife Refuge Eminent Domain Prevention Act

summary.text: Silvio O. Conte National Fish and Wildlife Refuge Eminent Domain Prevention Act - Amends the Silvio O. Conte National Fish and Wildlife Refuge Act to require the consent of the owner of lands in order to acquire the lands for purposes of the Act.

titles.title: Silvio O. Conte National Fish and Wildlife Refuge Eminent Domain Prevention Act

A bill to amend the Silvio O. Conte Fish and Wildlife Refuge Act to provide that the Secretary of the Interior may acquire lands for purposes of that Act only by donation or exchange, or otherwise with the consent of the owner of the lands, and for other purposes.
